TopicTitle: SSI Universe Thread - Looking for Co-operative Multiplayer KSP Players

Articles.Content:
The Shuttlecraft Systems Inc. Multiplayer Server is looking for a few good contributing pilots to help us reach a number of goals as we setup our universe.

Website: http://www.kerbalcentral.com/ssi/

Download DMP here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79111-DarkMultiPlayer-0-1-0-0-KSP-0-23-5-Alpha

SSI Universe DMP Server: ssi.kerbalcentral.com port 6702

SSI Universe Teamspeak: ssi.kerbalcentral.com

Open 24/7!

Please use this thread to discuss build goals, and post updates.

I was thinking of opening the server to include the following mods:

Kerbal Alarm Clock

Docking Port Alignment Indicator

Editor Extensions
I could help, since it's summer holiday and I have about a month until I leave for a vacation ;D
Thank you! It will be fun. We need to have someone launch and land inigma Base to Minmus and call it SSI Minmus Base. Its in the shared craft library.
